mapper.select: select A.room_id, C.acom_no, A.room_no, A.room_type, B.price , B.reserv_id, fk_member_id, C.acom_name , to_char(B.check_out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as check_out_date , to_char(B.check_in_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as check_in_date , B.reserv_status, B.reserv_person, C.acom_image from tbl_room A join tbl_reservation B on A.room_id = B.fk_room_id join tbl_acomodation C on A.fk_acom_no = C.acom_no
